content.text: Chance that power armored Knights will wear T-60 (or T-45/T-51 with BPAO)
content.help: The lower the value, the more likely Knights will wear other power armor sets, such as X-02, if available

content.text: Chance that power armored Paladins will wear T-60
content.help: The lower the value, the more likely Paladins will wear other power armor sets, such as T-65, if available

content.text: Legendary Power Armor vs Legendary Armor Drop Rates
content.help: Lower values mean more legendary power armor, higher values mean more legendary armor from legendary enemies
